---
name: Maintenance task
about: Suggest a maintenance or housekeeping task
title: 'Maintenance: '
labels: maintenance, needs-triage
assignees: ''
---

**Describe the maintenance task**
A clear and concise description of what maintenance work is needed.

**Why is this maintenance needed?**
Explain the current state and why this maintenance is required.

**Proposed changes**
Describe the specific changes or improvements you suggest.

**Alternatives considered**
If applicable, describe any alternative approaches or solutions.

**Additional context**
Add any other context, screenshots, or relevant information about this maintenance task.

**Priority Level**
- [ ] Critical (security or stability issue)
- [ ] High (important improvement needed)
- [ ] Medium (normal maintenance)
- [ ] Low (nice to have improvement)

**Maintenance Type**
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Documentation updates
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Security updates
- [ ] Code cleanup
- [ ] Build/deployment improvements
- [ ] Other (please specify)

**Checklist**
- [ ] I have searched existing issues to avoid duplicates
- [ ] I have provided a clear description of the maintenance task
- [ ] I understand this is a maintenance-related change
- [ ] I have considered the impact of this change
